stage-1/linux-fundamentals.title: Linux Fundamentals for Robotics
stage-1/linux-fundamentals.description: Most robotics software runs on Linux (specifically Ubuntu). Understanding the Linux command line is essential for developing, deploying, and debugging robotic systems.

stage-1/math-foundations.title: Mathematics for Robotics
stage-1/math-foundations.description: Mathematics is the language of robotics. This lesson covers essential mathematical concepts you'll use throughout your robotics journey.

stage-1/physics-basics.title: Physics Fundamentals for Robotics
stage-1/physics-basics.description: Understanding physics is crucial for designing, simulating, and controlling robots. This lesson covers the core physics concepts you'll apply in robotics.

stage-1/python-basics.title: Python Programming Basics
stage-1/python-basics.description: Python is the primary programming language for robotics development due to its simplicity, extensive libraries, and strong community support. In this lesson, you'll master Python fundamentals essential for robotics.

stage-2/gazebo-simulation.title: Gazebo Simulation Environment
stage-2/gazebo-simulation.description: Gazebo is a powerful 3D robotics simulator that provides realistic physics simulation, sensor simulation, and a rich library of robot models.

stage-2/ros2-setup.title: ROS 2 Installation and Setup
stage-2/ros2-setup.description: ROS 2 (Robot Operating System 2) is the industry-standard middleware for building robot applications. This lesson will guide you through installing and configuring ROS 2 Humble.

stage-3/computer-vision.title: Computer Vision for Robotics
stage-3/computer-vision.description: Computer vision enables robots to perceive and understand their environment through cameras. This is essential for navigation, object manipulation, and human-robot interaction.

stage-4/machine-learning-basics.title: Machine Learning for Robotics
stage-4/machine-learning-basics.description: Machine learning enables robots to learn from data and improve their performance over time. This lesson introduces ML concepts applied to robotics.

stage-5/project-guidelines.title: Capstone Project Guidelines
stage-5/project-guidelines.description: Your capstone project demonstrates mastery of Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics. This is your opportunity to build something impressive!
